entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Oshawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:14 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Oshawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:08 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Precipitation, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Oshawa Executive Airport 5:53 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Precipitation
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 61 %
Dewpoint: -6.4°C
Wind: W 32 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning this evening and ending late this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
